name: Vegan Sprouted Wheat Millet Sandwich Bread Recipe
description: This Vegan Sprouted Wheat Bread Recipe makes a great sandwich bread. It has sprouted wheat and Sprouted Millet for a nutty flavor. Dairy-free
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup wheat berries  (or other grains like spelt, or rye)
1/4 cup non dairy yogurt  (or coconut milk)

recipeInstructions.text: Sprout the grains: Soak the wheat berries and millet in water overnight. Drain, wash and let sit in the bowl covered with a damp paper towel and a lid. Depending on the ambient temperature, it might take a day or more to sprout.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprout the grains: Soak the wheat berries and millet in water overnight. Drain, wash and let sit in the bowl covered with a damp paper towel and a lid. Depending on the ambient temperature, it might take a day or more to sprout.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the sprouted grains with 3/4 cup water 2 to 3 cycles so the grains break down and are not too large to inhibit gluten formation. (each blending cycle is a minute long)
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the sprouted grains with 3/4 cup water 2 to 3 cycles so the grains break down and are not too large to inhibit gluten formation. (each blending cycle is a minute long)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the salt into the bread + wheat flours and keep ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the salt into the bread + wheat flours and keep ready.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the yeast and sugar in a 1/2 cup of warm water and let sit for 5 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the yeast and sugar in a 1/2 cup of warm water and let sit for 5 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: In a stand mixer or by hand, add the flours, yeast mixture, blended sprouted grains, warmed yogurt and oil and knead into a soft dough. Let sit for 1.5 hours. Punch down, use a Tbsp or so flour to shape into a loaf. Spray water on the loaf and sprinkle sesame seeds or oats. Cover with a towel and let rise until doubled. 40-45 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: In a stand mixer or by hand, add the flours, yeast mixture, blended sprouted grains, warmed yogurt and oil and knead into a soft dough. Let sit for 1.5 hours. Punch down, use a Tbsp or so flour to shape into a loaf. Spray water on the loaf and sprinkle sesame seeds or oats. Cover with a towel and let rise until doubled. 40-45 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 40-45 minutes at pre-heated 365 degrees F / 180ºc. Cool completely before slicing. Store refrigerated for upto a week. This Sandwich bread can be made into burger buns or dinner rolls as well and can be anywhere you use bread slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 40-45 minutes at pre-heated 365 degrees F / 180ºc. Cool completely before slicing. Store refrigerated for upto a week. This Sandwich bread can be made into burger buns or dinner rolls as well and can be anywhere you use bread slices.
